overview: Latvian beauty Savannah Secret, a gorgeous brunette model, is the erotic muse of perverted Italian director/stud Omar Galanti. But this sensuous bitch has a dark side that Omar explores in his hard-core epic, "Savannah's Secret," a four-scene tale of dominance, submission, bondage, nasty double crosses and sexual magic. "Savannah's Secret" showcases this glamorous superslut's range of kinky role-playing in a wide variety of filthy action.
title: Savannah's Secret
